casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 8, 2008

[Cite as 04/08/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-1667.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0544. Frisch’s Restaurants, Inc. v. Ryan.

Franklin App. No. 06AP-117, 170 Ohio App.3d 578, 2007-Ohio-545. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration the motion for admission pro hac vice of Michael Dominic Meuti by William P. Marshall on behalf of appellee, It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
